I wrote a java class, 
and it need a jar for  extracting  txt from  pdf (PDFBox-0.6.6.jar)

I added this line in project.properties
maven.jar.PDFBox = ${basedir}/lib/PDFBox-0.6.6.jar
and put PDFBox-0.6.6.jar to heritrix_home/lib/

but maven complain :
package org.pdfbox.pdfparser does not exist

I'm a maven beginer. anybody can help me ,thanks
